title: 05/19/21 DPS Hour 3 Marv Albert
itunes:title: 05/19/21 DPS Hour 3 Marv Albert
description:
Marv Albert tells Dan that it was just time for him to retire. Marv says he will miss the NBA the most, and it probably won't really hit him until next Fall when the NBA is set to begin.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
